text: is a former member of the Japanese idol girl group HKT48. She was a member of HKT48's Team H. == Biography == ===Career=== Anai passed HKT48's 1st generation auditions in July 2011. Her audition song was "Haru ni Nattara" by Miwa.https://plus.google.com/106102390858541443310/posts/5TnLvVaQaXU Her stage debut was in November 2011. In March 2012, she was selected to form Team H and was also appointed captain.http://www.news24.jp/entertainment/news/1621718.html In the 2014 AKB48 general elections, Anai ranked for the first time, placing 39th with 18,825 votes.https://plus.google.com/106102390858541443310/posts/KxzXZFgB4G2 On June 8, 2016, during an HKT48 stage greeting, Anai announced she was leaving the group. ===Character=== Anai's nickname at the point of debut was "Chiichan",http://ameblo.jp/hkt48/entry-11058186599.html but was later changed to "Chihiron". However, she is still called "Chiichan" by members. She is also often referred to as "Kyappu", which is derived from captain, since she was appointed the captain of Team H when it was formed. Anai likes pumpkins and tomatoes,https://plus.google.com/106102390858541443310/posts/eSuPd6a4Fbc but dislikes avocados.https://plus.google.com/106102390858541443310/posts/geYVSFroFDD She studied classical ballet throughout elementary and middle school."Shuukan AKB" April 27, 2012 Anai admires Yuko Oshima,http://www.nishinippon.co.jp/nlp/item/311760 and respects Minami Takahashi and Rino Sashihara.https://plus.google.com/106102390858541443310/posts/e3mQu1j7aqmhttps://plus.google.com/106102390858541443310/posts/79pmDWmT7sD ==Discography== ===HKT48 singles=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
